alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota and eastern Fall River Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1203 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Prairie Winds Casino, or 21 miles northwest of Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loneman, Prairie Winds Casino, South Lakeside, Slim Butte and Slim Buttes Housing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
